title: The fastest dominion game?

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Not quite sure if this was the fastest game, have anyone ever beat this?

replies.body:
One of the teams had a DC, it looks like.

Closing out the game in under six minutes when someone isn't there isn't that big of a deal.

Off the top of my head, the biggest stomp I've ever seen with two full teams was about six and a half minutes.
Sadly yes, one in their team left in this case it was tryndamere. I've also finished another game in 5V5 summoners rift and that game was like 6:59!

{{item:3070}} I sometimes forget that game mode exists {{item:3070}} 

Grats though.
Most forget it because it's full of botters.
